value.query:
SELECT 
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyId__r.Name,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyRelationshipTypeId__r.Name,

%vlocity_namespace%__PartyId__r.%vlocity_namespace%__AccountId__r.PhotoUrl,

%vlocity_namespace%__PartyId__r.%vlocity_namespace%__ContactId__r.PhotoUrl,
Id,
LastModifiedDate,
Name,
%vlocity_namespace%__AssetId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__BeneficiaryPercentage__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__CommissionPercentage__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyAccountId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyContactId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyLink__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PartyRelationshipTypeId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__ProductionCodeId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__RelationshipToInsured__c FROM %vlocity_namespace%__AssetPartyRelationship__c WHERE %vlocity_namespace%__AssetId__r.Name = 'VLO-PL-83108'
